name: directus
description: Directus is an open-source headless CMS and data management platform that wraps existing databases with a sleek UI and APIs. It supports SQL databases, custom workflows, GraphQL, and can be self-hosted or used in the cloud.
features: Headless CMS: Wrap any SQL database with instant APIs. Database to API in minutes.
GraphQL & REST: Flexible API options for any frontend. Universal compatibility.
Custom Workflows: Automate tasks with visual workflow builder. No-code automation.
Role-Based Access: Granular permissions for teams and users. Secure data management.
Sleek Interface: Modern, intuitive admin panel. Beautiful content management.
Self-Hosted: Complete ownership of your CMS and data. No vendor lock-in ever.
